title: Height of the riser shall not be more than 0
clause_text: Height of the riser shall not be more than 0.15 m and width of the tread 0.3 m. The steps shall not have abrupt (square) nosing. Maximum number of risers on a flight shall be limited to 12.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Height of the riser shall not be more than 0.15 m and width of the tread 0.3 m. The steps shall not have abrupt (square) nosing.
